statements: DELETE FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE temperature > 100 AND mineral_content LIKE '%gold%'
DELETE FROM Geospatial_Geothermal_Data WHERE location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(45.1234 -110.5678)')
DELETE FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE depth > 100 AND temperature_range @> '{"min": 50, "max": 100}';
DELETE FROM geothermal_exploration_data WHERE site_name = 'Mount Everest' AND depth < 100 AND temperature_range ->> 'min' = '70';
DELETE FROM Analysis WHERE site_id = 20 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM SiteSelection WHERE selected = false;
